message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $115. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to pay a bit more than the value you mentioned, but I'd like to get a better deal.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. How about we meet in the middle? I can offer it to you for $105.
I appreciate the middle-ground offer, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $95? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get a good deal.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $100, but that's my absolute lowest price.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $100, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we meet at $92? I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get a good deal.
